pr_title: Fix a test which is failing randomly.

timeline.message:
Fix a test which is failing randomly.

The test fails because after clicking on close-session button page
reloads and button dissapears. It happens in a random while that
makes that sometimes in the second click the button is not available.
ensure that there is always a package.json file

timeline.bodyText: Do something with the "boolean" value returned by "delete".
timeline.author: vaadin-bot

timeline.message: ensure that there is always a package.json file
